metadata.title: CVE-2016-10721 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: partclone.restore in Partclone 0.2.87 is prone to a heap-based bufferoverflow vulnerability due to insufficient validation of the partcloneimage header. An attacker may be able to execute arbitrary code in thecontext of the user running the affected application.

criterions.comment: partclone package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
